title: Strange Animals
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 43 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 130L
description: Have you ever seen a strange animal? In Strange Animals, students will discover what makes some animals unique. Through vivid and colorful photographs, students will be able to identify special features of uncommon animals. The use of high-frequency words and repetitive text support emergent readers as they practice asking and answering questions as well as comparing and contrasting characteristics of strange animals.
reviewWords: animals, blue dragon, living, rosy, strange, water bear
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast details in a text
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Identify and use proper capitalization and punctuation
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word look
